virtual bool gaia::core::FragmentStatePagerProvider::isWidgetFromObject ( gaia::core::Widget *  widget,
gaia::core::Fragment *  object 
) [virtual]

Determines whether a page Widget is associated with a specific key object as returned by instantiateItem(WidgetController, int).

This method is required for a IPagerProviderF to function properly.

Parameters:
widgetPage Widget to check for association with object
objectFragment to check for association with widget
Returns:
true if widget is associated with the key Fragment

Implements gaia::ui::IPagerProviderF.
